channel.title: §█§ MithScape -- Help Please / HD Client DL Link §█§
channel.description:
MithScape - http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367385.0.html
I'm having some issues with MithScape.
1. Combat magic spells don't work at all for me, though for everyone else they do. 2. Ranged doesn't work at all either. When i click to attack it goes up and punches them. (Same with Magic) 3. All in all the server just isn't working right for me and I'm not sure why.
Any Suggestions?
Also, if anyone have an HD client link, that would be greatly appreciated. ;D

item.title: §█§ MithScape -- Help Please / HD Client DL Link §█§
item.dc:creator: @life-scape life-scape
item.description:
@life-scape wrote:

Wait…

case 16: //Ice barrage Autocasting if (getRandom(magicAttack()) >= getRandom(magicDefence())) { Server.engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue(p2); p.magicSpellHit = true; p2.freezeDelay = 20; } else { p.magicSpellHit = false; } p.autoCastDmgDelay = 4; p.autoCastDelay = 5; p.frames.playSound(p2, 171, 1, 0); p.frames.playSound(p, 171, 1, 0); p.requestAnim(1979, 0); p.autoCast[0] = 0; stopMove(p); deleteItems(p, death, 4, water, 6, blood, 2); //autoCastEngine(casterX, casterY, offsetX, offsetY, 1979, -1, 0, 368, 6, p2.playerId, 3); break; } }

Does

				p.magicSpellHit = false;

need to be:

				p.magicSpellHit = true;

Every spell is false.

Read full topic
